what: survstan: Fitting Survival Regression Models via Stan
title: survstan: Fitting Survival Regression Models via Stan
text: aim R package survstan provide toolkit fitting survival models using Stan. R package survstan can used fit right-censored survival data independent censoring. implemented models allow fitting survival data presence/absence covariates. inferential procedures currently based maximum likelihood (ML) approach.

title: survstan: Fitting Survival Regression Models via Stan
text: can install development version survstan GitHub :

text: formula object class "formula" (one can coerced class): symbolic description model fitted. data data optional data frame, list environment (object coercible .data.frame data frame) containing variables model. found data, variables taken environment(formula), typically environment function called. baseline chosen baseline distribution; options currently available : exponential, weibull, lognormal loglogistic distributions. ... arguments passed methods.

title: The 'survstan' package. — survstan-package
text: aim R package survstan provide toolkit fitting survival models using Stan. R package survstan can used fit right-censored survival data independent censoring. implemented models allow fitting survival data presence/absence covariates. inferential procedures currently based maximum likelihood (ML) approach.
